install.name: SEF Title Prefix and Suffix
install.author: Radoslaw Kubera
install.description: This plugin adds prefix and suffix to title

param.name: spacer
param.label: Spacer
param.description: Spacer between prefix/suffix and the title

param.name: showifequal
param.label: Show if Equal
param.description: When the Suffix (or Prefix) is equal to the current Title, and this option is set to 'no', the prefix/suffix will not be shown.'
